original_text: Hezekiah had very great wealth and honor, and he made treasuries for his silver and gold and for his precious stones, spices, shields and all kinds of valuables.
korean_text: 히스기야가 부와 영광이 지극한지라 이에 은금과 보석과 향품과 방패와 온갖 보배로운 그릇들을 위하여 창고를 세우며

sentences.original_text: Hezekiah had very great wealth and honor
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야는 매우 큰 부와 명예를 가졌다

sentences.original_text: and he made treasuries for his silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그의 은과 금을 위한 보물창고를 만들었다
